reviewText: Our third year Spanish class has used "The Aztec Empire" VHS video for several years in our Mexico unit. Because second year Spanish wanted to use this video, I looked for a new video. I thought I had found it in "Ancient Mysteries: Secrets of the Aztec Empire." Unfortunately, this DVD is the same as the VHS, only it has a different name. It is a great product, but I feel it is false advertising, because the DVD did not say on the cover that it is a repackaging of "The Aztec Empire."
